# Results
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

library(dplyr)

sector_norm <- sector %>%
  group_by(Sector) %>%
  arrange(Date) %>%
  mutate(
    base_price = first(`Adj Close`),
    rebased = (`Adj Close` / base_price) * 100
  )

ggplot(sector_norm, aes(Date, rebased, color = Sector)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Rebased Price Index (Start = 100)",
       y = "Index Level") +
  theme_minimal()

```
